title: Change admin-only server status text from “Local Offline” to “Online”

requirements.text: Update the admin-only server status/availability UI so that the status text currently shown as "Local Offline" is replaced with "Online" (English text), ensuring this change is reflected anywhere that specific status label is rendered in the admin-mode server controls.

quotes: Replace local offline with online in the admin mode switch

acceptanceCriteria: When server access is disabled (admin-only toggle off) and the server status indicator is visible, the UI does not display the text "Local Offline" anywhere.
The UI displays "Online" instead of "Local Offline" in the relevant admin-mode server status/indicator location(s).
No other server status labels (e.g., "Checking…", "Offline") are unintentionally changed.

constraints: Use English for all user-facing text.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI components).
nonGoals: Changing backend behavior or adding new backend endpoints.
Changing the semantics of the server access toggle (it remains a local-only toggle that does not start/stop the backend canister).
Redesigning the Title Screen layout or admin gate flow beyond the requested text change.
